name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
benefits_summary: The serum helps with Brightening, Fades dark spots.
usage_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen It is designed for Oily, Combination skin.
safety_information: Some users with sensitive skin may experience Mild tingling for sensitive skin. Always patch test before full use and follow up with sunscreen in the morning.
